allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
docs: add multi-agent task assignment system design

Architecture design for an MCP-based task coordination system that
enables multiple Claude Code agents to work in parallel using git
worktrees, with DAG dependency management, conflict prevention,
and SQLite-backed state management.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(python3 -c " import json, sys pkg = json.load\(sys.stdin\) pkg[''pnpm''] = {''onlyBuiltDependencies'': [''better-sqlite3'', ''esbuild'']} json.dump\(pkg, sys.stdout, indent=2\) ")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: implement MCP server for multi-agent task coordination

- SQLite-backed task management with DAG dependencies
- Git worktree isolation per task for parallel agent work
- File ownership system \(exclusive/shared\) for conflict prevention
- 9 MCP tools: create, list, get, claim, start, update, complete, merge, cleanup
- 78 passing tests across 4 test suites
- npm-publishable with bin entry point and shebang

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/htlin/agents-task-assigning commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
chore: format package.json and update local settings

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
